pages.text: “Ndikulumbilira ku mwamba ndi Nyenyezi imene imadza usiku
“Ndithudi palibe mzimu uliwonse koma uli ndi msungi wake (amene akuuyang’anira ndikulemba zonse zochita zake)
“Amatuluka kuchokera pakati pa mafupa a msana (wa mwamuna) ndi chifuwa (cha mkazi)
“Ndithu Iye ndiwakutha, kumbwezeranso (ku moyo pa mbuyo pa imfa)
“Munthu sadzakhala ndi mphamvu (tsiku limenelo zodzitetezera iye mwini) ndiponso sadzakhala ndi mtetezi
“Ndithudi iyi (Qur’an) ndi mawu olekanitsa (Haqq ndi Bâtwil - choona ndi chonama)
“Nanenso ndikuwakonzera chiwembu (champhamvu kwambiri chimene sangathe kuchipewa)
“Basi, apatse nthawi osakhulupirira apatse nthawi pang’ono, (aona posachedwa)
“Lemekeza dzina la Mbuye wako Wapamwambamwamba (ndikuliyeretsa ku zinthu zosayenera)
“Kupatula chimene wafuna Allah (kuti uchiiwale); ndithu Iye amadziwa zoonekera ndi zimene zimabisika
“(Palibe chikaiko ulalikiwo) aukumbukira (ndikuthandizidwa nawo) amene akuopa Allah
“Ndipo wamavuto ambiri, (wamakani ndi wokanira), adzitalikitsa ndi ulalikiwo
“Amene adzalowa ku moto waukulu (umene wakonzedwa kuti udzakhale malipiro ake)
“Ndipo sakafa m’menemo (ndikupumula kumazunzo), ndiponso sakakhala ndi moyo (wamtendere)
“Ndikukumbukira dzina la Mbuye wake (ndi mtima wake, ndi lirime lake) uku akumapemphera
